channel.title: Server wont connect?
channel.description: I run the source and run, btw I just got a blank, so it says "Trying to connect o 127.0.0.1 or whatever the localhost ip is.. And it says port is 43594 and my port is opened I checked.. So I have no idea why it is not letting me in.. Any ideas :o.. If someone can help me on my skype, my skype is raven eggs. Thanks

item.title: Server wont connect?
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

so the client is trying connect to the source through the 127.0.0.1 ip?

so you did change the ip in the client?

Read full topic
